an4.80:4.1: At one time the Buddha was staying near Kosambi, in Ghosita’s Monastery.
an4.80:4.2: Then venerable Ānanda went up to the Buddha,
an4.80:4.3: bowed, sat down to one side,
an4.80:5.1: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why females don’t attend council meetings, work for a living, or travel to Persia?”
an4.80:5.6: This is the cause, this is the reason why females don’t attend council meetings, work for a living, or travel to Persia.”
